body.name: Baby Trend Cover Me 4 in 1 Convertible Car Seat, Quartz Pink
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 36 mins
features: Integrated adjustable canopy for UV protection: Integrated height and angle Adjustable canopy for in-car UV protection. Flip-out side visors provide additional shade protection for either side of the car seat.

4-In-1 seating system: Built for extended use including 1) rear facing infant mode from 4 to 18lbs 2) rear facing toddler mode from 18 to 40lbs 3) forward facing with harness Mode from 22 to 65 lbs 4) belt positioning booster mode from 40 to 100lbs

Comfort & convenience for kiddos: Child can quickly adjust the canopy when car is in motion and sun is coming from multiple directions. The coverme's exclusive comfort cabin offers extra padding to keep child comfortable on long rides.

Includes an integrated headrest with no rethread harness. Three positions recline that allows front seat passengers to have extra legroom, while an integrated recline flip foot offers dual adjustment and gives the right angle with ease.
Fits three across in most vehicles: At its widest. The Baby Trend Cover Me 4-in-1 Convertible car seat is 18.25", which allows it to fit three children across in most vehicles.
body.description: Introducing the Baby Trend Cover Me 4-in-1 Convertible car seat! S in our study involving 400+ moms currently using convertible car seats, The #1 complaint about their convertible is children irritated by sunlight in the Cars. The cover Me has an integrated patented height and angle Adjustable UPF 50+ canopy for full in-car shade protection. The canopy is integrated and attached on a built-in track so it's easy to adjust and remove. Flip-out side visors provide extra shade protection for kids When the car is in motion and the sunlight's coming from multiple directions. Built with premium and Deluxe fabric and Materials, The comfort Cabin seat offers extra padding to keep your child comfortable on a long ride. Two deep cup holders also allow children to place their sippy cups and snacks within reach. The integrated headrest with no rethread harness offers ultra-convenience for parents when adjusting the headrest position. With the Zero radius recline, plus flip foot for dual recline adjustment, parents can easily adjust the seat and recline in the car. Finally, the cover Me can hold a child from 4 - 100lbs with four unique modes: rear facing infant, rear facing toddler, forward facing toddler and belt positioning booster.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Introducing the Baby Trend Cover Me 4-in-1 Convertible Car Seat! In our study involving 400+ moms currently using convertible car seats, the #1 complaint about their convertible is children irritated by sunlight in the cars. *According to Survey conducted through Qualtrics with over 400 participants in the US.

Integrated canopy and comfort cabin Height and angle adjustable UPF 50+ canopy The canopy has a built-in track so it's easy to adjust and remove. Flip-out side visors provide extra shade protection for kids when sunlight comes from multiple directions. With premium and deluxe fabric and materials, the Comfort Cabin Seat offers extra padding to keep your child comfortable.
Infant rear facing 4-18 lb Toddler rear facing 18-40 lb Forward facing 23-65 lb Belt positioning booster 40-100 lb

Baby Trend With over 30 years of car seat manufacturing experience, Baby Trend offers safety and performance you can trust for your smallest passengers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe, sturdy and fashionable
reviews.reviewText: Hands down the best car seat! Safety is number one most important, I love how the seat adjusts from sitting up straight to a recline. I love the colors! I bought my kids three of these car seats, red, pink and blue! They're comfortable and love the sun shade. It was easy to assemble by far! And super easy to adjust the straps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simply better and seems safer than most high cost car seats.
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for a pocket friendly car seat without compromising on safety, durability and comfort for your little one, search no further, the quality of this car seat exceeded my expectations. Why waste more money on ridiculously expensive car seat when you can get this for a fraction and still guarantee optimum peace of mind? I have owned 2 GRACO 4 in 1 car seats that are priced over $360, however, I can confidently say that this car seats measures up (if not even better) to the GRACOs in all ramifications. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy with product
reviews.reviewText: I waited a little too long before I bought it so I didn’t get to take full advantage of all stages. I like this car seat however it is bulky so it would be better recommended for an automobile with more room. I have mine in the car and it’s still in the rear facing position. I can’t slide my passenger seat back very far to allow my comfort. When I have my granddaughter in the car seat I feel she is safe and secure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I'm so happy I found this car seat! I had been looking for a couple of months but everything I liked was so expensive! Then I found this one! The price is GREAT, the seat is well made and sturdy which makes it seem very safe, I love the color (scooter), and I'm obsessed with the canopy!!! Baby is 9 months old (21 lbs) and fits perfectly in it! I love all of the little extra features that this seat offers that others don't have like the white line along the outside of the straps to make sure they are not twisted, the nonslip on the shoulder pads, and that it goes up to 100lbs! The buckle is easy to undo and everything to adjust the highth and strap length is super easy to use aswell. It is a little on the heavier side but to me heavier feels safer! I don't want a car seat that I feel like I could twist in half! It was a bit bigger then I had anticipated and it took us a second to get it installed in our vehicle but we finally had success! After, we took a drive to test it out and baby was asleep in less then 5 minutes!!! He usually would just scream in the carrier car seat, so I'd say that was the biggest 5 star rating you could have gotten lol. All in all a wonderful product, it is exactly what it says it is, and speedy delivery. I just love Babytrend products!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good carseat but small and difficult to reinstall.
reviews.reviewText: We have two cars but one car seat for my 1-year-old.ProsThe fabric is soft and stain resistant. It has two nice cupholders, and the canopy is a fantastic feature. It hugs my baby in all the right places and I don't feel like we'll need to purchase another car seat again anytime soon!ConsIt is incredibly difficult to take from one car and reinstall in another as a rear-facing infant car seat.The place where the seat belt goes is difficult to get through.I would definitely recommend this if you are planning on leaving it in one car! If not, I'd either buy a second or get a different car seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My son absolutely loves this seat! It's very durable and comfy for him! I love the padding it has! He loves to move the sunviser up and down constantly 😆

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best car seat we’ve ever purchased
reviews.reviewText: This car seat was easy to install with the built in bubble level and lower anchors.I especially appreciate that the shade is able to move by the foot area for when the sun is hitting my baby’s face. She does prefer this car seat over another brand that we have that clicks into her stroller. She seems so comfortable in this one and tends to fall asleep vs crying in the other one. The price and overall quality and ease of use is unbeatable in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love that it has a sun shade still like infant car seats. Not overly bulky. And room to grow for years to come.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fácil de instalar en el coche, buen material.
reviews.reviewText: Me gusto mucho por qué puedo cubrir a mi bebé de solEs muy fácil de instalar en el coche y sobre todo está muy cómoda está afelpada y es muy seguraLa recomiendo 💯
El precio comparado con otras tiendas está muy bien. La calidad de la silla es muy buena. Ya lo tengo usando por 2 semanas y sin problemas

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente calidad a un buen precio
reviews.reviewText: Los materiales del asiento son de muy buena calidad, muy cómodo y nos encanto por el toldo que trae incluido, protege muy bien al bebé de los rayos del sol.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente calidad sobre paso mi espectativa
reviews.reviewText: La verdad me dejó muy sorprendido la calidad de la silla los accesorios y todas las opciones que tienes para usarla la verdad podría darle 10 estrellas
Estoy fascinada, es muy segura, vivo en un lugar de calor y mi hijo no se acalora para nada, los niveles de inclinación son perfectos, 100% recomendada.
